content.rendered:
Mauritius is heaven on Earth for those who plan to spend their honeymoon on a tropical island. They can find here everything they want: white and soft beaches, clear and calm waters, sunny days, adventure and fascinating marine life. This is all that those who book Mauritius honeymoon packages need in order to be happy and in order to feel like they are really celebrating their love.

Mauritius is referred to as a very cosmopolite island. The various cultural influences are highly visible and the combination between them creates the special charm of this place. African, Asian and Indian influences blend with European ones. The result is the fact that tourists from all over the world find here something that reminds them of home.

There’s no stronger argument in favor of Mauritius Tour Packages than the beauty of the beaches. They are the most valuable asset of these islands and they are “responsible” for the great number of tourists and for the good impression that they have. The white sand and the clear waters are enough to make everybody feel relaxed and happy. Watching the sunset from the beaches of Mauritius is one of the most romantic things that newlyweds can do. The atmosphere is charming and mystical. Almost the entire coastline of Mauritius is circled by a coral reef. This is the reason why beaches are so beautiful.

Snorkeling here is an absolutely fabulous experience because you can admire the marine life closely. Almost all hotels and resorts include snorkeling in their program for those who take Mauritius honeymoon packages. Other water sports can also be practiced, but because of the coral reef, snorkeling and diving are widely appreciated. There are many beautiful beaches in Mauritius, but the most famous ones are Blue Bay, Flic-en-Flac, Belle Mare, Roches Noires and Palmar.

It is hard to stay away from the beaches for one day, but you won’t regret if you include Port-Louis in your Mauritius honeymoon packages. Tourists can enjoy the museums in the city such as the Natural History Museum or the Postal Museum. The main attraction of Port-Louis is shopping. The goods are duty free, so many tourists leave home with various souvenirs. Caudan Waterfront is a place where newlyweds are going to feel great because it provides many entertainment options. The most important shopping malls are here, as well as eateries and cinemas. Hotels in Mauritius are famous for their excellent service. Tourists are going to feel excellent and they will have at their disposal all sorts of facilities.

    We never share your Information.
